Package simulation.mmsolve

Class func

java.lang.Object
simulation.mmsolve.fi_xi
simulation.mmsolve.func
Direct Known Subclasses:
funcForHomotopy
public class func extends fi_xi
The function whose roots will be found using Broyden's or Newton's method. extends fi_xi as it's a function from R^n to R^n.

    • intTable

      final double[][][] intTable
      The interactions table for the combined dipolar and exchange interactions between each pair of spins

    • momentTable

      final FieldTable momentTable
      The table which gives the magnetic moment of an ion for a given local 3-component applied magnetic field

    • arr

      final singleSpin[] arr
      The array of all spins in the system for which a self-consistent solution is to be found

      External magnetic field B_x

    • extBy

      final double extBy
      External magnetic field B_y

    • numManualCalc

      int numManualCalc
      Number of times an exact diagonalization is performed during the current self-consistent calculation. This happens when we encounter a magnetic field outside the bounds of the given momentTable

    • suppressInternalTransFields

      final boolean suppressInternalTransFields
      Whether internal transverse fields are suppressed or not (offdiagonal dipolar terms included or excluded)

    • func

      public double[] func​(double[] x) throws ConvergenceException
      Evaluates the function func at point x[0..n-1].
      Specified by:
      func in class fi_xi
      Parameters:
      x - - The vectors of variables at which the function is to be evaluated
      Returns:
      The vector function at point x[0..n-1], \vec f ( \vec x )
      Throws:
      ConvergenceException

    • g

      public double g​(double[] x, int i, double[][][] int_config_Matrix, FieldTable momentTable, singleSpin[] arr, double extBx, double extBy, boolean suppressInternalTransFields)
      Auxiliary function which calculates the field at site i and returns the appropriate magnetic moment for that field
      Parameters:
      x - - The current configuration of magnetic moments
      i - - The site i at which to calculate the moment
      int_config_Matrix - - Interaction table
      momentTable - - Magnetic moment table
      arr - - The full system array. Used for the spin direction
      extBx - - External Bx magnetic field
      extBy - - External By magnetic field
      Returns:
      the objective moment, i.e. what the magnetic moment should be, considering the current configuration
